title: La Quercia Recalls Dried Pork Products Due To Insufficient Dehydration
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 17, 2016 La Quercia, a Norwalk, Iowa establishment, is recalling approximately 932 pounds of cured, dried pork loin products due to insufficient dehydration, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. Insufficient dehydration could lead to an outgrowth...
